tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Have been consulting Dr. Nitish for my mother's longstanding knee and leg pain and other general ailments. Dr. Nitish is extremely patient in hearing all her issues. He methodically eliminated potential reasons one by one and identified the crux of the problem. My mom is extremely happy consulting him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Nitish you are  friendly and  able to listen and understand my problem. Even though the appointment was online, it was just like a real one.
Thank you for your advice, I will follow the instructions and report you back on next consultation 
Regards 
Bala Subaramanyam

** ******* ******** ******** ********* *** ** **** ** *** **** *** ** ***** ****** ** *** ********* Right from nothing an in-depth clinical history to arriving at the pinpoint diagnosis he does it with ease.  Felt in safe hands when I got a treatment from him regarding an injury.

Dr. Nitish is a thorough professional. His study & practice in his field of Medicine is tremendous. He is not just a friendly doctor but also an intelligent one. The way he diagnosed my problem is appreciable. The time he spends with his patients to understand, heal & suggest solutions to their problems are remarkable. I definitely recommend him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Dr. Nitish, was very courteous and he did detail investigation about my concern and suggested me appropriate actions. The medicines he suggested ensured my issue got resolved in timely manner.

Gave me their valuable time and heard my health problem very patiently. Extremely very professional but friendly at the same time. *** ********* ********** **** **** ********* *** i could see improvement in my health within one day.
Doctor is very patient and he listens to everything we have to say. He explained everything in detail.

Doctor is very responsive and cleared all my doubts with patience...happy with treatment
thank you
**** ******* listening and wait for investigation and last solved all problems related to the patient thanks sir üôè
